statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY XX.LoginCount Desc) as RowNo , XX.UserID , XX.UserName , XX.LoginID , XX.LoginCount , XX.FirstLoginDate , XX.LastLoginDate FROM ( SELECT AA.UserID , U1.UserName , AA.LoginID , COUNT(AA.ID) as LoginCount , MIN(AA.CreateDate) as FirstLoginDate , MAX(AA.CreateDate) as LastLoginDate FROM dbo.TLoginLog AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TUser U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UserId = U1.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.LoginID LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR U1.UserName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND AA.CreateDate >= Convert(Datetime, #StartDate#, 112)
AND AA.CreateDate < DateAdd(Day, 1, Convert(Varchar(8), #EndDate#, 112))
GROUP BY AA.UserID, U1.UserName, AA.LoginID ) XX ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID
, AA.UserId , U1.UserName , AA.LoginId , AA.Version , AA.MainSkin , AA.GridSkin , AA.IpAddress , AA.MacAddress , AA.Status , AA.CreateDate as LoginDate , AA.UpdateDate as LogoutDate FROM dbo.TLoginLog AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TUser U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UserId = U1.ID WHERE AA.UserID = #UserID# ORDER BY RowNo
